#summary Instructions on setting up your development environment.

The Climate Collaboratorium is based upon v.5.2.3 of the [http://liferay.com Liferay web-portal].  It has been developed against Tomcat 6.1 and MySql 5.1  We recommend the following steps to getting your development environment up and running.

==Basic Preparation ==

1. Install the Liferay Tomcat bundle
2. Install MySQL 5.1
